text: how do you wanna sell em here recently I
have received quite a few requests for
drinking snack or ammonia and so today
I'm gonna make one using oxtail it's a
very simple and easy recipe that
everyone can cook and you can enjoy this
with a glass of beer and some French
baguettes the dish looks really
sophisticated but if you have a pressure
cooker you can't finish it
in just 30 minutes so let's begin
firstly you want to make shallow
incisions around the oxtail so it can
cook faster and also it's gonna be
easier to eat later then soak in water
with a teaspoon of salt to release the
blood and change the water a few times
after that by boys the bones about 5 to
10 minutes with some snack ginger and a
tablespoon of rice wine this has to
reduce the strong smell and also to
release the impurities inside the bones
and them out the whole pot and rings the
oxtail clean
for spices you're gonna need a teaspoon
of pepper corns three slices of ginger
juice colonies and one cinnamon stick
add a tablespoon of oil in the pressure
cooker and fry a teaspoon of minced
garlic until fragrant then cause in the
oxtail and stir well add two tablespoons
soy sauce and the spices
ginger Chinese and cinnamon stick a
teaspoon of salt and a teaspoon of sugar
also add a teaspoon of caramel sauce or
Numo and stir well for five minutes then
add one can of beer at one teaspoon of
chicken stock and cover the lid of the
pressure cooker and cook for about 20
minutes after that let the pressure
cooker cool down and open the lid a
carrot and potatoes and cook for another
10 to 15 minutes until the potatoes and
carrots are soft transfer to a serving
plate and garnish with some cilantro or
subtle coriander you can serve this over
hot steamed rice or with a crispy
baguettes
don't forget a can of beer and an
accompany happy drinking
thank you for watching bye
